column4: hbaigu> yes :) e.g. utorrent (through wine) which always puts an icon in tray with all the other front-ends
I have a bug with utorrent, can you confirm?
Open utorrent.  minimize it to tray.  open it again.  is it a very very tall and skinny window?
yes.  I asked you a yes / no question
right-clicking > show / hide utorrent still puts it in a tall and skinny window
Do you know any way to make it go away from the taskbar?
right.  it can be resized to correct this, but it's still annoying
So you get maximum throughput with utorrent 1,6 under wine?
I'm getting 60kbytes/s right now, which is only like 5% of my max speed
How do you get your stuff off the server?  Is it close physically?
Then why run it there at all? :P
So you need to keep your ratio up for private trackers, eh.  I seee
Oh, here is another one.. have you gotten torrent files setup to open with utorrent?
